name: Greta

topics.response_text: Goddammit! Why did you tell Carol that Gob was dead? You couldn't have kept that to yourself?

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about Mister Crowley?
topics.response_text: He's an odd one. Why just a few months ago he decided he didn't like people calling us zombies.

topics.topic_text: What do you know about Underworld?
topics.response_text: To tell you the truth, hon, I don't really know much about it. All I know is that it used to be some sort of exhibit.
You're in for a treat, the finest food in DC. Four stars.

conversation.response_text: Too bad about Crowley. I heard Tenpenny put out a contract on him.
It's more than that, Carol, you've been moping around here for... I don't know how long. The customers have even started to notice.
I'm worried about you, that's all. Just think about what I said.
I was saying that you need to get some rest. You're falling asleep up here. You never sleep through a whole night anymore. I hear you getting up.
I'm not really ready to talk about it.
I'm not really ready to talk about it.
Sure hon, what do you need?
Sure, if you don't mind waiting a few minutes.
Hungry again? What do you need?
I'm not sure, I'll go check.
Not this again. Look, I've been telling you every day for ten years, if you don't like it, go make your own damn food.
Well then. What'll it be, Crowley?
See? I knew you'd come around.
Hey, hon. I haven't seen you in here in a while.

description:
Greta is a 165 year-old Ghoul Female.

A female ghoul cook and waitress who runs Carol's Place bed and breakfast in Underworld with her life partner Carol. Known for her sarcastic humor and ability to create surprisingly edible meals from wasteland scraps.

Greta's Personality: Deadpan, sarcastic, devoted to Carol, proud of her ghoul heritage and cooking skills, outwardly confident but internally worried about Carol's declining health.

Greta's Backstory: Greta was once a human living in the D.C. area before becoming a ghoul sometime after the Great War of 2077. She immigrated to Underworld around 2217, where she met Carol. The two fell in love and have been together for over sixty years, eventually opening Carol's Place together, realizing Carol's lifelong dream of running a bed and breakfast. Greta has become a popular figure in Underworld, much to the annoyance of local crime boss Ahzrukhal.
